    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Programiranje</string>
            <string language="en">Programming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programmation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγραμματισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Programación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o programiranju v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: elementi programa (spremenljivke, rezervirane besede, ...), dokumentiranje, razhroščevanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about programming, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: basic program elements (variables, reserved words, ...), documentation, debugging.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">program</string>
            <string language="en">program</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">spremenljivka</string>
            <string language="en">variable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dokumentacija</string>
            <string language="en">documentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razhroščevanje</string>
            <string language="en">debugging</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über die Programmierung, Teil 
Ematerialien für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: 
grundlegende Programmelemente (Variablen, reservierte 
Wörter...), Unterlagen, prüfend aus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de la programmation, partie 
d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et informatique. Contenu de 
chapitre : éléments de programme de base (variables, mots 
réservés...), documentation, mettant au point.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre a programação, parte dos 
e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. Índices do 
capítulo: elementos de programa básicos (variáveis, palavras 
reserved...), documentação, eliminando erros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa la programmazione facente parte i 
e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. Soddisfare di 
capitolo: elementi di programma di base (variabili, parole 
riservate...), documentazione, mettente a punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για τον προγραμματισμό, μέρος των ε-υλικών 
για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. Περιεχόμενο 
κεφαλαίου: στοιχεία προγράμματος BASIC (μεταβλητές, 
διατηρημένες λέξεις...), τεκμηρίωση, προγραμματιστικό λάθος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre la programación, parte de los 
e-materiales para la informática e informática. Contenido del 
capítulo: elementos de programa básicos (variables, palabras 
reservadas...), documentación, poniendo a punto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">variabel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterlagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausprüfen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
